item.title: Designing cover page for an exam
item.description: Our university has a specific style that courses need to use as a cover page for exams, shown below. They circulate a Word template at the beginning of each term. Since I typeset my exams in ConTeXt, I decided to translate this cover page template to ConTeXt as well. In this post, I’ll explain how I went about doing this translation.

item.title: Creating a clean presentation style in 40 commits
item.description: Did you always want to learn ConTeXt, but did not know where to start? I have written a git-based tutorial that should help you get started. The idea of the tutorial is to start with an empty document, and add features one-by-one.
